message:
Thank you very much Stephen! It's the first time I reply to an article of yours but I read your stuff for years and it helped me a lot to understand the behaviour of async/await. I have one feedback regarding the section "Preventing the Deadlock" in this article:

In the end you've written the note: "It is best to apply both best practices. Either one will prevent the deadlock, but both must be applied to achieve maximum performance and responsiveness." But in the blue box above you've written that applying ConfigureAwait(false) is a dangerous thing to do.

Consider to rewrite the note at the end regarding the first best practice to make it clear that it is dangerous and therefore maybe meanwhile a "not so best practice anymore".
